column4: suspected of being drunk crashed a Camry with a Royal Cambodian Armed Forces number plate.------The incident occurred at 12 pm local time on November 28

column12: and took the car to Phnom Penh Road Traffic Office waiting for the owner to come forward.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/390694------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/43575------*This is the------ second incident------ in the same area involving Chinese drivers using RCAF plates and getting into solo accidents.
